name: Dank Dunks
description:
A love letter to all the good flash games back in the day   

useful RADICAL INFORMATION

  • The game might take a while to load, don't panic
  • Full-screen mode recommended for the most RADICAL experience!
  • Works best on Firefox and Edge (surprisingly)
  • This game saves your progress and stores the data somewhere in your browser's folders
  • You might have to press ESC multiple to access the pause menu in game, due to esc being used to exit the full-screen mode when playing in browser
